DOC.brief_summary: This observational non-interventional study is designed to demonstrate the improvement of physical function in COPD patients on treatment with Spiriva Respimat and allows adverse events to be recorded and evaluated.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Non-Interventional Study With Spiriva Respimat in COPD Patients
DOC.criteria: COPD patients who require treatment with longacting anticholinergic Patients cannot be recruited if any of the general or specific contraindications listed in the Patient information leaflet or the Summary of Product Characteristics applies. Spiriva® Respimat® is contraindicated in patients with hypersensitivity to tiotropium bromide, atropine or its derivatives, e.g. ipratropium or oxitropium or to any of the excipients.
